Package sd.assignment.backend.services

Class CartService

java.lang.Object
sd.assignment.backend.services.CartService
@Service public class CartService extends Object
This Service deals with methods specific to the `cart` entity

  • Method Details

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(CartDTO cartDTO) throws Exception
      Validates and creates a new entry in the cart of the given user
      Parameters:
      cartDTO - contains information about the food and the cart owner
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is any problem with the details or with the DB save

    • deleteCartByUsername

      public void deleteCartByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Validates the given user and deletes the cart items for the specific user
      Parameters:
      username - The user whose cart is to be deleted
      Throws:
      Exception - If the user does not exist or the cart couldn't be emptied

    • getCartByUsername

      public List<CartDTO> getCartByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Validates the given username and then returns the products that are stored in his cart
      Parameters:
      username - The user whose cart is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      The products and quantities in the cart
      Throws:
      Exception - If the user does not exist or the cart couldn't be accessed
